law.text:
** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 570 OF 2012**
Subject to subsection (b) of this section, the President of the Fund may settle a claim that the Fund has against a governmental unit or person who is alleged to be liable for an accident for which the Fund pays compensation.
The President may settle a claim under this section only if:
the Workers' Compensation Commission consents; and
for a settlement that will prejudice any right of an injured employee, the employee consents.
